main event: A military observer reported seeing a round whitish-orange object on 14 August 1958 at Angel's Peak, Nevada.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 20-40 seconds., The object came directly towards the observer, stopped for 5 seconds, and then moved directly away., The sightings provided inconsistent information regarding the time and duration., Weather conditions were reported as very clear with thunderstorms in the area., The observer was a military communication center operator in the 865th AC&W Squadron.
